text: @realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Almost like a depression. Food lines.  How could you let it come to this.  Why didn’t you listen and act in the first warming of Coronavirus? We  would be in a much better place right now with fewer deaths if you had ! 😡
